horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: The last week of February will witness a powerful Mercury retrograde in the water sign of Pisces where it gets debilitated, but the week will also be a continuation of Mars transit in Aquarius. This will make you ambitious about your goals, so you will take time to identify those roles which can match with your targets. Mars can make you over enthusiastic, but make you are realistic too, so that you don’t have to be discouraged later on. You will join new groups, join brainstorming sessions, and even also take online tests for your dream projects. Some of you will get new opportunities to join a company, get support from your team and also get some foreign collaborations too.

The Sun, Venus and Mercury are moving through your twelfth house, so, you may be a bit under the weather, but this is quite natural when any planet moves through the twelfth house. You will take some time to recover, but that will not stop you from your daily life. During this time, you will get strange dreams which will be highly intuitive, and they will carry the signals about the future. Despite being silent, you will make the best plans for your future.

The planet for communication and technical devices, Mercury will start its retrograde through your twelfth house, so the first priority for mental and physical health. This retrogression can bring technical glitches, communication problems and travel blocks, so make sure you cross check your electronic gadgets and communication. If you are taking some tests, then you have to double check it before the submission. You may also meet some of your old friends or even ex-lovers also, but you don’t have to take them back into your life. You will also be interested in spiritual matters, and some of you will go for meditation, therapy and even past life regression.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: Taurus Sun, Moon and rising signs natives are going through very important time in their career due to Martian transit through the air sign of Aquarius. Mars will open up new opportunities in your job like new projects, or add on work in the existing projects. The tenth house indicates managers and father’s wealth as well, so you will have more conversation with your managers, and there will be some discussions about father’s wealth as well. During this week job seekers will get the closest opportunities to get a new job or a call letter. Mars can make you a bit impulsive, so you have to control your speech and tone.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus will impact your eleventh house, so, your strong focus will be on your long term goals, and network circles. You will surely gain recognition in within your team and your ideas will get great acceptance, but make sure you accept other’s ideas as well. This transit shows financial gains through networking, so make use of this transit. Foreign collaborations and charity programs also will be the part of this transit, and you will be interacting a lot with technically advanced people. During this week, you will also meet influential people through networking, and they will support you in the future endeavours.

However, Mercury will start its infamous retrograde in this week, and that can bring blocks like technical glitches, communication issues and travel blocks. You will have to be very careful with this transit as it is moving through your eleventh house of hopes and profits. Everything is going well, but one mistake can ruin everything, you are building, and don’t let your world collapse. This transit may bring communication issues, and make sure you cross check all the projects before final submission.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: The last week of February is very important for Gemini Sun, Moon and rising signs, as your ruler Mercury will start its infamous retrogression mode during this week. Before going into the retrogression, we need to consider Martian transit through Aquarius. This transit is impacting your ninth house of higher studies and foreign collaborations, so you have the closest opportunities for both. However, Mars is a natural malefic, so studies and foreign travel will come up with some difficulties. There are chances for confrontations with teachers, mentors and fatherly figures. You may question the traditional belief system, and that can create controversies, so stay silent in such matters. Additionally, you will be spending time in teaching, writing and publishing.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are moving through the water sign of Pisces, so your career is very important during this week. These planets in the tenth house indicates multitasking, as you have to work round the clock. These planets will bring projects from admin, creative sector, communication and technology. Those who wish to have own ventures will have the closest opportunities to start a new business too. You will be visible in the public front more than ever as the Sun transit will bring such opportunities.

Your ruler Mercury will start its retrograde this week, and it is a red flag, as it is occurring in the tenth house as there will be technical glitches and communication issues. There are chances for errors in the work, so you have to cross check your projects before final submission. Your work devices can suddenly stop, and you may also lose your data, so make plan B or don’t forget to keep the copy of your work. During this week, you may get some job offers, but make sure they are genuine, as retrogression can bring fake offers.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: The last week of February will witness a massive move by Mercury as it will start its retrograde. Before that Mars is moving through the air sign of Aquarius, so the financial matters will be very important. Since Mars is a natural malefic, and it is also the indicator of financial liabilities, so, you will have to be careful with your financial matters. There are chances for arguments regarding insurance, tax, PF and inheritances. There will be sudden expenses as well, and you have to prepared for that too. Minor medical procedures can also come up during this time, so you have to take care of your health.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are moving through the ninth house, and that indicates foreign travels or collaborations. You will feel the need to expand your knowledge base and worldview, so you will try to make contacts with learned people, especially from different cultures. Three planets in one house means multiple projects, and these projects will be from writing, teaching, travelling and publishing related domain. Studies will be a main theme during this transit, so if you were trying to enrol in a course, this is the best time for that.

Mercury will start its infamous retrograde from this week onwards, and that will bring confusion, travel blocks and technical glitches. Since Mercury is moving through the ninth house of long distance travels, so there are chances for travel blocks. So, you have to have a plan B, as the travel blocks can come up as missing flights, passport, or you cancelling the traveling plan. If you are giving money to any travel agency, then you can cross check the track of this agency before you pay them. This is a good time for students with back paper, as this is the closest time to get through those papers.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: The relationship sector is highly active with a powerful Mars, as it is moving through the air sign of Aquarius. Being a Leo Sun, Moon or rising sign, you will always try to have an upper hand in all relationships despite personal or professional. Mars is a natural malefic, so there are chances for relationship problems, so you need to be careful with your personal and professional sphere. You will be in an attacking mode for no reason, and the loss will be purely yours. Business partnerships are also very complex, so you need to handle them carefully. Additionally, you will get opportunities to meetings, which can be online or offline as well.

The Sun, Mercury, and Venus will impact your finances, and your financial matters are also no going through a safe zone. The Sun is in a water sign, and Mercury is debilitated, and Venus is exalted, and all these are showing that you should not take any risk in the finances. This is not the time to take up any investment projects, but you can surely restructure your finances. You will also take some plans to take new loans, or pay back some of your debts too.

Mercury is debilitated and it will start its infamous retrograde during this week and it can put you into further issues if you are not careful. There will be technical glitches, communication problems and travel blocks too. This is not the right time for long distance travels, so, please don’t plan anything new, otherwise you must have plan B. When you sign a document, then you have to cross check all those documents otherwise you will land in troubles. If you are working in finance domain, then you need to be ultra careful. Altogether, this retrogression is asking you to be careful with your communication.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: The last week of February will witness a complex transit by Mercury, your ruler, going in retrograde motion. Mars is moving through the sixth house, and this is a 50-50 transit for your work, so, you will get opportunities but there will be struggles as well. Daily life will become very demanding, as the workload will increase, so you have to keep a strict routine. There will be a competitive environment at work, and conflicts with colleagues can also appear. Your physical fitness will be also important, and you will start a new workout plan or diet. Legal or service-related matters will move surely forward.

The Sun, Venus and Mercury are moving through the seventh house, so the relationships are very important. Three planets indicate some kind of concerns, so you have to be careful with your personal and professional relationships. Single Virgo Sun, Moon and rising natives will feel the need for a partner, but this is not the time to start one. The Sun doesn’t like to be here, and Mercury is debilitated, so the business relationship also can go through some issues. You will also get opportunities to attend social gatherings like business meet, networking and personal functions.

Mercury will turn retrograde during this week, and it is moving through the seventh house, there will be communication issues, technical glitches and travel blocks. The seventh house indicate long distance travel, so you will have such plans, but there are chances for last minute cancellation. Your ex-lover can come back, but this is not the time to get them back, as they will not be there for a long term. When Mercury goes retrograde, you will get fake business offers, and you have to be careful with such offers. You will meet new people, but don’t overshare anything personal with them.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: The transit Mars is progressing through the last degrees of Aquarius, so the fifth house of children, and creativity. The love life will become intense and passionate, but there will be arguments as well. For single Libra rising, Sun or Moon signs will have the closest opportunities to start a new relationship. Love affairs can start suddenly, but this is not the time to give or take commitments. You will take up creative activities, but kindly avoid risk taking tendencies. Children will have important projects, and they will demand more attention, so you have to spend more time with them. You will also spend time with friends, and attend entertainment events.

The Sun, Mercury and Venu are moving through the sixth house, so your focus will be shifting into your work, diseases and enemies. You will become more detailed oriented, and disciplined at work, but there will be a competitive environment at work. These transits will bring the closest opportunities for job seekers to get a new job. Libra Sun, Moon and rising signs will also opt for a medical consultation which will be routine. Some of you will adopt pets or work for animal activist groups during this week.

Mercury, the planet for communication and travels will start its retrogression during this week, and that will bring travel blocks and communication issues. Since this retrogression is taking place in the sixth house, you have to be careful at work. Please avoid any kind of unwanted communication with your colleagues, otherwise these same conversations will be a backlash on you. If you get a new job offer, then you should check the track of the company which you get. Please cross check your work devices, as there are chances for technical glitches, communication problems and travel blocks too. You may also meet your ex-colleagues too.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: For Scorpio Sun, Moon and rising signs will focus more your home and family, as Martian transit is impacting your fourth house of home and family. Mars itself is the planet for land, and construction, so there will be some construction related activities. Real estate deals like buying and selling land or property, but make sure you cross check the terms. Home improvement projects, and relocation is also possible during this time, but there will be some hurdles in everything you do. There will be some family functions, and you will also go and meet some of your friends.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are moving through Pisces, and this will impact your fifth house of creativity and children. These planets will surely make you highly creative as the Sun, Venus and Mercury, all indicates various types of creative talents. The fifth house indicates CenterStage, so you will be able to display your creative skills, and you will promote it. However, please avoid high risk ventures, as there are chances for potential financial losses too, as Mercury is debilitated. Your children, or youngsters around you will have more needs, and parents also should spend more time with them.

Mercury will start its retrograde during this week, and that will impact your communication, technical glitches, and travel blocks. Since Mercury is moving through risk taking, you should avoid that as this is not the time for that. You will get business offers, but please cross check whether these are genuine, otherwise you will have losses. This is not a good time for those who invest in stocks, and there are chances for fluctuation too. Pregnant women must take care of their health, as there are chances for minor health issues too. You may meet your ex-lovers, and this is not the time to give and take any romantic connections.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: The last week of February will highlight your business ventures, as the third house is highly active due to Martian transit. This transit will increase your courage, and energy, so you will have bold speech. Due to the Martian transit, you may end in arguments with your siblings, network circles and neighbours too. This is the time to start projects from writing, teaching and publishing. You will enrol in a new course, buy new electronic devices, or you will get engage in marketing activities. There will be a lot of traveling opportunities, but that can be pretty tiring too.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are moving through the water sign of Pisces, and it will impact the fourth house of home and family. This transit can make you more involved in the family matters, so you need to spend more time at home. You will have some home improvement projects, so you will spend more money as well. There will be a lot of real estate deals, renovation and relocation related plans as well. Since Mercury is debilitated, so you have to be very careful if you are signing any deals for construction or renovation. Family meetings and issues with ancestral property also can come up during this phase.

Mercury will start its retrogression motion during this week, and that means some technical glitches, travel blocks, and communication issues. Since the retrogression is occurring in the fourth house, there will be problems at home, do, don’t kickstart any arguments and stay away from family politics. You will meet relatives who were missing for a long time, but there are chances for arguments with them as well. These three planets will aspect the tenth house of career, so there will be some glitches at work, so you have to take care of that as well.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: The transit Mars is moving through the air sign of Aquarius, so, the financial matters will be important. Mars itself is the planet for financial liabilities, so sudden financial needs will arise, and you have to be prepared for that. Martian transit through second house also shows new job opportunities in fulltime or freelance mode, which will be beneficial too. However, this is not the to invest in new projects, or in any financial plans, otherwise there will be losses. You will have strong desire to accumulate assets, but that should not be through any unauthorised financial plans. There will be some tensions regarding savings too.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are moving through the water sign of Pisces, so you will have a lot of work as the third house is activated. There will be a lot of work from teaching, training, and communication too. Content creators, and writers will also have new opportunities, so get ready for taking up some projects. There will be strong communication with your siblings, and they will be going through some stress as well. You will get multiple opportunities for networking, short travels and debates online and offline too. Please avoid any kind of social media discussion as it can create controversies.

Mercury, the planet for communication, and travelling will start its infamous retrogression mode during this week. This retrogression will last for the next three weeks, so you will have to be careful with the business ventures. Mercury retrogression will bring communication issues, so you have to cross check your communication. Please take care of your electronic devices, as there are chances for technical glitches, so repair them. Please have travel plans, as there will be travel blocks, so you should have a plan B. This is a complex transit and health may go down for a short time.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: Mars is moving through the first house so, you are in an active mode, so you will be working round the clock. There will be sudden rise in energy levels, but this can also work against you like getting headache or fever, but this is for a short time. You will have a strong desire to take an initiative, and it can also result in impulsive decision making, but kindly avoid that. You will plan for an image makeover, so you will go for some beauty treatments or you will buy a new attire. However, you will be in an aggressive mode, and that can bring conflicts with your dear and near ones.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are moving through Pisces, so the financial matters will be very important. Three planets in one house indicates stress, so there will be some financial issues like over spending or lack of money. Venus will move out from this conjunction soon, so you will not have this issue for a long term. There will be more income opportunities, but expenses also will be the part of this transit. There will be common issues where you discuss with your family, but they will end in arguments.

Mercury will start its retrogression during this week, and that will bring confusion in communication. Please cross check your financial deals as there are chances for some errors. Mercury retrogression is known for technical glitches, so you have to take care of your electronic devices at work and home. If you are planning for traveling, there will be travel blocks, so, you should have a plan B. This is a good time to upskills, so you will join some courses too. Please expect sudden expenses and prepared for that, otherwise you will have some troubles.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting February 22
content: For Pisces Sun, Moon and rising signs, your personal life and health is very important as the Sun, Mercury and Venus are moving through your sign. Your personal visibility will surely in increase, and you will be more socially engaging. Physical appearance also will gain importance, and you will try to update your style, so you will but new attire and take up new health care practices. New projects will come up, but you have to be careful as Mercury will start its retrogression during this week. This retrogression will bring communication issues, technical glitches and communication problems too.

Mars is moving through your twelfth house, so this is a complex time for you, as Mars is moving through the twelfth house of isolation and detachment. Others may perceive you as bold or aggressive, but you are actually desperate, as you feel things are getting delayed and progress is also not matching up to your expectation. This situation will move away, so this is just the matter of time, until then you will spend time in spiritual practices. This is a good time for better planning, and you will ponder over it. You will get some updates about your foreign travels and settlements.

Mars will aspect the sixth house of work, routine and health, so it again shows some health related concerns which can be majorly related to lower abdomen. Your diet is very important, so please follow a good diet, which is advised by your medical practitioner. You will spend time in solving workplace issues, but there will be a kind of restlessness at work, so you need to handle it carefully. You should avoid all kind of unhealthy talks at work. New job opportunities also will be coming up during this time, but make sure you can do them.
